name: VF Marketing Solutions
tag_list: marketing, public-relations, publishing, web-design, logo, corporate-identity
overview:
VF Marketing Solutions provides solutions to promote your business or organization.

  • Building successful marketing strategies
  • Differentiate your business
  • Utilize the internet as a useful marketing tool
  • Reach out to the local community
  • Reach out globally
  • Incorporate art with technical/professional presentation
  • Graphic design experience in all aspects of the industry (logo & editorial)
  • One-stop for all your marketing needs including printing and finishing solutions
  • Innovative healthcare marketing strategies and solutions such as:
    • Poster presentations
    • Conference/meeting slide presentations
    • Statistical presentations/graphs
    • Medical publications/brochures
    • Medical illustrations
    • Patient educational materials
